Control Name: Shred, incinerate, or pulp hard-copy materials so that cardholder data cannot be reconstructed. Secure storage containers used for materials that are to be destroyed.

control_attributes.Control: Shred, incinerate, or pulp hard-copy materials so that cardholder data cannot be reconstructed. Secure storage containers used for materials that are to be destroyed.
control_attributes.Requirement: 9.8.1. Restrict physical access to cardholder data
